---
title: "data-visualization"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
space_launches <- read_csv(here("data", "space_launches.csv"), na = "")
```

```{r}
 ggplot(space_launches, aes(type, mission)) + 
 geom_dotplot(binaxis = 'y', stackdir = 'center') 
```
